organisation_name: MOL Hungarian Oil and Gas Company (MOL Group)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: The 'MOL Group Annual Brussels Reception' is our annual stakeholder relations event.
goals__remit:
MOL Group is an integrated, international oil and gas company, headquartered in Budapest, Hungary. 
It is active in over 30 countries with a dynamic international workforce of over 25,000 people and a track record of more than 100 years in the industry.
